name: Amy K.
text: The lifetime of the house guarantee is outstanding. We plan on being in this house at least another 40 years so knowing that my house has an extra layer of protections puts our minds at ease. Thank you Partner.

name: Mary Kay B.
text: This is the best decision my husband and I ever made! No overflowing gutters here! Thanks for professional installation and making the old gutters look better than they have in years!

name: Stephen E.
position: Stops Seed Pods And Ice Jams
text: Mine have been on for 3 years and still work like they are new. I highly recommend this product. I have seed pods and pine needles with a lot of leaves and yes they work great no ice jams no shingles torn up they work.
